hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

LH (Lab).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Light Arrows# and #a Red Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.
